summary: The bill, titled the Strengthening Protections for Domestic Violence and Stalking Survivors Act of 2025, amends Title 18 of the United States Code. It expands the definition of 'intimate partner' to include dating relationships, and includes dating partners' children in the definition of 'misdemeanor crime of domestic violence.' The bill also introduces new prohibitions related to firearms for individuals convicted of misdemeanor crimes of stalking.
